document_data.name: ''Armor of Command''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Armor of command''''' were [[enchanted]] sets of impressive and beautiful [[medium armor]] often worn by nobility and military leaders.
document_data.Powers: ''Armor of command'' was imbued with a ''+3'' enchantment. The potent magic of these sets surrounded the wearer with an aura of influence and admiration, increasing their charisma and persuasiveness.
document_data.History:
Throughout history, these sets of armor were highly sought after by accomplished and aspiring generals. One notable incident that involved an ''armor of command'' happened at the [[Battle of Moregrade]] when an unlucky sycophant was granted command of an army just because they wore this beautiful enchanted armor.

These armors became more common in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], found in several cities across the [[Sword Coast]], [[Neverwinter]]. One set of ''armor of command'' could be found in catacombs underneath [[Voonlar]] in the [[Moonsea]] region ''circa'' [[1373 DR]].
